subject: Simson Hub S1 - Sticker Set
description_text:
Hello,
 
Is it possible for me to buy 4x sticker set for the Simson Hub S1? If so, what is the price (including shipping to Switzerland)?
 
Thank you very much and best regards,
Erhard Deiss

conversations.body_text: Hi E. deiss,    Sorry, we no longer offer stickers at this time, but we are currently designing new ones.
